mods.name: Agent's Items KITS
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: 30 consumable kit packs that SURVIVE dropship landing! Buy kits at workshop, land on planet, consume to receive all items. Includes: Raw Resources, Processed Materials, Tools, Weapons, Armor, Food, Medicine, Building Pieces, Furniture, and more!

mods.name: Agent's Items (Legacy)
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Direct workshop items (1,500+). Note: Items may not survive dropship - use KITS version instead, or buy from Orbital Exchange Interface on-planet.

mods.name: Agent's BioLab
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Adds all 10 Bio Lab Legendary weapons to the Workshop! Includes Frontier Revolver, Kinetic Rifle, Tactical Bow, Mining Armature, Biotech Maul, Heavy Flamethrower, Anti-materiel Rifle, Javelin Launcher, Slug Launcher, and Ice Mammoth Sledgehammer. All purchasable for 1,000 Exotics each.

mods.name: FastProcessing All 10x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes ALL crafting and processing 10x faster! Covers 1,057 recipes including cooking, smelting, crafting attachments, and more. No more waiting!

mods.name: Indestructible Tools & Weapons
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes all tools, weapons, armor, buildings, doors, and crafting stations virtually indestructible. Sets durability to the game's maximum cap (12,700,000 for most items, 9,000,000 for lightning rods).

mods.name: No Food Spoilage
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Prevents all food items from spoiling in your inventory. Meat, fish, vegetables, and all other perishables will last forever!
